SEARCH
Package org.carrot2.labs.smartsprites

Class SpriteImageDirective

java.lang.Object
org.carrot2.labs.smartsprites.SpriteImageDirective
public class SpriteImageDirective extends Object
Represents a directive that declares an individual sprite image.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    SpriteImageDirective.SpriteImageFormat
    Defines supported image file formats.
    static enum 
    SpriteImageDirective.SpriteImageLayout
    Defines the layout of this sprite.
    static enum 
    SpriteImageDirective.SpriteUidType
    Defines the UID Generation Mode of this sprite.

    • spriteId

      public final String spriteId
      Unique identified of this sprite.

    • imagePath

      public final String imagePath
      CSS file relative path for this sprite image.

    • uidType

      public final SpriteImageDirective.SpriteUidType uidType
      Non-file-name extension after the sprite image path to force a cache update on change, prefixed by '?'.

    • layout

      public final SpriteImageDirective.SpriteImageLayout layout
      Layout of this sprite image.

    • format

      public final SpriteImageDirective.SpriteImageFormat format
      Format of this sprite image.

    • matteColor

      public final Color matteColor
      Matte color to be used when reducing true alpha channel.

    • scaleRatio

      public final float scaleRatio
      Scaling ratio to apply to background; default is 1.

    • spriteLayoutProperties

      public final SpriteLayoutProperties spriteLayoutProperties
      Sprite layout properties defined at the sprite image directive level. The defaults provided here can be overridden at the sprite reference directive level.

    • parse

      messageCollector - the message collector
